mapper.insert: INSERT INTO CALENDER VALUES (TO_DATE(#{startDate},'YYYY/MM/DD HH24:MI'), TO_DATE(#{endDate},'YYYY/MM/DD HH24:MI'), #{writerNo}, #{sectionOption}, #{selectColor}, #{title}, #{openOption}, #{alarm}, #{place}, #{memo}, 'Y', #{realWriter})
mapper.select: SELECT A.START_DATE, A.END_DATE, A.WRITER_NO, C.SECTION_NAME, B.COLOR_CODE, A.DATE_NAME, A.PUBLIC_RANGE, A.NOTICE_TIME, A.PLACE, A.MEMO, A.REALWRITER_NO FROM CALENDER A JOIN CAL_COLOR B ON (A.COLOR_NUM = B.COLOR_NUM) JOIN CAL_SECTION C ON (A.SECTION_NUM = C.SECTION_NUM) WHERE 1=1 AND TO_CHAR(A.START_DATE,'YYYY/MM/DD HH24:MI') = #{startDate} AND TO_CHAR(A.END_DATE,'YYYY/MM/DD HH24:MI') = #{endDate} AND A.WRITER_NO = #{writerNo} AND A.STATUS = 'Y'
SELECT COLOR_NUM FROM CAL_COLOR WHERE COLOR_CODE = #{selectColor}

SELECT A.START_DATE, A.END_DATE, A.WRITER_NO, C.SECTION_NAME, B.COLOR_CODE, A.DATE_NAME, A.PUBLIC_RANGE, A.NOTICE_TIME, A.PLACE, A.MEMO, A.REALWRITER_NO FROM CALENDER A JOIN CAL_COLOR B ON (A.COLOR_NUM = B.COLOR_NUM) JOIN CAL_SECTION C ON (A.SECTION_NUM = C.SECTION_NUM) WHERE 1=1 AND A.DATE_NAME LIKE '%' ||#{searchWord}||'%' AND A.STATUS = 'Y'
